thread.section_title: Business & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Behind a Hedge Fund’s Billion-Dollar Bet On Busted Oil Companies

author: Ryan Dezember
title: Behind a Hedge Fund’s Billion-Dollar Bet On Busted Oil Companies
text:
With oil prices at their highest level in three years, it would seem a good time to cash out of energy investments purchased cheaply during the oil rout.
Hedge-fund manager Fir Tree is finding it isn’t.
Fir Tree was one of several Wall Street firms that saw an opportunity to profit from the pain inflicted on heavily indebted energy producers...
